description: Regenerates primary or secondary connection strings for the topic.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to regenerate the authorization rule.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

key.description: Optional, if the key value provided, is reset for KeyType value or autogenerate Key value set for keyType

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.
